actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the Russian Federation should be strongly condemned for its plan to provide nuclear tecnology to Iran, and that such nuclear transfer would make Russia ineligible under terms of the Freedom Support Act.

summary.text: Urges the condemnation of the Russian Federation if it follows through on a commercial agreement to provide Iran with nuclear technology. Declares that such transfer would render Russia ineligible for assistance under the Freedom Support Act.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the Russian Federation should be strongly condemned for its plan to provide nuclear tecnology to Iran, and that such nuclear transfer would make Russia ineligible under terms of the Freedom Support Act.
